name: BREAKOUT: One Shot
description:
BREAKOUT

 

 

Slow time, deflect bullets, and rack up kills with a single shot.

♥ If you enjoyed it, you can rate it here: 
https://itch.io/jam/gmtk-2019/rate/461408 ♥

 

WASD / Arrow Keys - Move

LEFT CLICK  -  Shoot

SHIFT   -   Slow Time

CURSOR  -  Aim Bullet

R  -  Retry Level

made by Lunaruna

music by Cillian Creates

 

BREAKOUT was developed in under 48 hours!

Made with love for GMTK Game Jam 2019
